Comments
September 21, 2021
fastcat99
Really good piece on an Excalibur team. All the other pieces are so crazy, she can stand back and pull tokens off of them with leadership and boost them with empower, then sneak in when someone is all tokened up for a BCF shot. Everything I like in a back-row piece!
August 11, 2021
Goop
They gave her powers very accurate to the comic, unfortunately the dial is very "meh" because of it. Melee leadership is not always the easiest to pull off and she has no move and attack. She's ok for only 35pts, especially if you can land on those last 2 clicks.
